Detailed Description

Utility class for helping to do regression testing.

) [inline, static]

Try to link and if necessary copy a directory from another place.

Parameters:
targetName - path to directory to be synced
localName - where we want data synced to locally.
hostUrl - url for data if copying necessary.
errorMsg - fill in error message here if something goes wrong.
Returns:
- true if sucessful, false otherwise.
